core:process.core:name: GetCardNumber
core:process.core:comment: Capture a customer's card number by Swiping, Keying or Scanning, or, optionally, using the ICC reader. Not for use in card tendering. If ICC reader is used, user is prompted to remove the card once read. If AllowSkip is set the process will exit on pressing OK with no input (default false). If AllowCancel is set the cancel button will be available (default true).

core:processNote.core:description: Override this to replace standard loyalty card number capture.
If PDC PaymentService is in use, use that instead to capture swiped or contctless cards.
